product_overview: ChamberConnect is a web platform designed to facilitate the management and networking of chambers of commerce between Switzerland and the Democratic Republic of Congo. It provides comprehensive features for chamber management, event booking, member communication, and user profile & dashboard management, ensuring an efficient bilateral trade and networking environment.
core_goals: Enable users to discover, consult, and join bilateral and national chambers of commerce.
Provide a robust event booking system including reservation, confirmation, and cancellation capabilities.
Offer a user-friendly interface for profile management and personalized activity dashboard.
Facilitate member and partner management for chambers with moderated communications.
Support administrative roles with tools for user and chamber management, notifications, and membership validation.
Integrate live exchange rate information for bilateral chambers to enhance business interactions.
key_features: Chamber Management: Create, view, and manage bilateral/national chambers with detailed info, partners, members, and events tabs.
Event Booking System: Browse upcoming events, view detailed modal information, reserve places, confirm participation, join online events, and cancel reservations respecting business rules.
User Profile & Dashboard: Manage user profile details, upload profile photos with immediate update across the platform, and view interactive statistics and recent activity.
Forum & Communications: Discussion forums dedicated to chamber members with posts and messaging capabilities.
Membership Workflow: Request and approval system for joining chambers with user status badges (pending, approved, non-member).
Administration Panel: Super admins and chamber managers can manage users, chambers, notifications, and member validations.
ExchangeRateService: Provides real-time exchange rates for supported bilateral chambers with caching and error handling.
Responsive UI with dark mode support, animated modals, carousels, filtering, and toast notifications.
user_flow_summary: Event Booking Flow: User browses events, views detailed modal info, reserves a spot if available, confirms participation, receives access to online sessions for virtual events, and can cancel before confirmation.
Membership Flow: User views chamber details, requests to join via 'Join' button, waits for admin approval, and upon approval becomes a member with appropriate badges displayed.
Profile Photo Upload Flow: User selects a photo file, previews instantly, uploads via AJAX, backend updates user records, and frontend refreshes profile images everywhere with a success toast.
Dashboard Navigation Flow: User accesses dashboard to view joined chambers, participated events, upcoming bookings, and activity feed with interactive elements and links to detailed pages.
validation_criteria: Functional tests ensuring chamber consultation, joining workflow, tab navigation, and accurate exchange rate display.
Event booking tests covering reservation success/failure, confirmation, cancellation restrictions, AJAX modal loading, and real-time seat updates.
User profile tests verifying photo upload, info update, password change, and consistent displays across all UI components.
UI tests validating responsive design, dark mode compliance, animations, button states, toast notifications, and error message displays.
Integration tests for API data correctness, caching mechanisms, error handling, and notifications for admins on member approvals.
